comments.content: It must be **[Bickham Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140119/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm/regular/glyphs.html)** using the stylistic alternate characters
Wow! I woulda never have figured that out. Thanks!
